recipe_name: Honey and mustard glazed chicken salad with olive oil and balsamic dressing
author: James Tanner
method: Heat two tablespoons of the olive oil in a frying pan. Fry the chicken for 5-6 minutes, until golden-brown and cooked through, and then transfer to a plate.  Fry the onion in the pan until soft.  Mix the honey and mustard together in a large bowl. Add the rocket to the bowl along with the chicken and onion. Toss together and drizzle with a little balsamic vinegar.  Place onto a large serving plate and serve.
ingredients: 4 tbsp olive oil,  ½ chicken breast, skin removed, sliced into strips,  ½ red onion, sliced into thin wedges,  2 tbsp clear honey,  1 tbsp Dijon mustard,  85g/3½oz fresh rocket leaves,  balsamic vinegar, for drizzling
